attributableSequenceId.description: ID of the sequence this email is attributed to.

attributableSequenceName.description: Name of the sequence this email is attributed to.

bodyHtml.description: HTML content of the email body.

bodyText.description: Plain text content of the email body.

clickCount.description: Total number of clicks on links in the email.

calendar.description: Calendar information related to the email.

clickedAt.description: Timestamp when the email was clicked.

deliveredAt.description: Timestamp when the email was delivered.

desiredAt.description: Desired time for the email to be sent.

errorBacktrace.description: Backtrace information for any errors encountered.

followUpTaskScheduledAt.description: Timestamp when the follow-up task is scheduled.

markedAsSpamAt.description: Timestamp when the email was marked as spam.

meetingDescription.description: Description for any meeting associated with the email.

meetingDuration.description: Duration of any meeting associated with the email.

meetingLocation.description: Location of any meeting associated with the email.

meetingTitle.description: Title of any meeting associated with the email.

notifyThreadScheduledAt.description: Timestamp when thread notification is scheduled.

openCount.description: Total number of times the email has been opened.

openedAt.description: Timestamp when the email was opened.

optimizedScheduledAt.description: Optimized scheduled time for the email.

overrideSafetySettings.description: Override settings related to safety measures.

repliedAt.description: Timestamp when a reply was sent.

replySentiment.description: Sentiment analysis of the reply received.

retryAt.description: Timestamp for retrying the email send.

retryCount.description: Number of times the email has been retried.

scheduledAt.description: Timestamp when the email is scheduled.

stateChangedAt.description: Timestamp when the state of the email changed.

trackLinks.description: Flag indicating if links in the email are being tracked.

trackOpens.description: Flag indicating if email opens are being tracked.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the email was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of the last update to the email data.

followUpSequenceStartingDate.description: Date when the follow-up sequence starts.

opportunity.description: Opportunity information related to the email.

recipients.description: List of recipients of the email.

sequence.description: Sequence information related to the email.

task.description: Task information related to the email.

tasks.description: List of tasks associated with the email.

template.description: Template information used for the email.

user.description: User information related to the email.
